variations.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 270% of ATK to a single target. Generates a Shield equal to 50% of the damage dealt for 3s.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 315% of ATK to a single target. Generates a Shield equal to 50% of the damage dealt for 3s.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 360% of ATK to a single target. Generates a Shield equal to 50% of the damage dealt for 3s.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 405% of ATK to a single target. Generates a Shield equal to 50% of the damage dealt for 3s.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 450% of ATK to a single target. Generates a Shield equal to 50% of the damage dealt for 3s.

Deals Physical DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies and stuns them for 0.5 seconds. Within the next 10 seconds, reduces their Physical DEF by 5% of Cetess' Physical DEF each time they take damage, up to 100%.

Deals Physical DMG equal to 315% of ATK to all enemies and stuns them for 0.5 seconds. Within the next 10 seconds, reduces their Physical DEF by 5% of Cetess' Physical DEF each time they take damage, up to 100%.

Deals Physical DMG equal to 360% of ATK to all enemies and stuns them for 0.5 seconds. Within the next 10 seconds, reduces their Physical DEF by 5% of Cetess' Physical DEF each time they take damage, up to 100%.

Deals Physical DMG equal to 405% of ATK to all enemies and stuns them for 0.5 seconds. Within the next 10 seconds, reduces their Physical DEF by 5% of Cetess' Physical DEF each time they take damage, up to 100%.

Deals Physical DMG equal to 450% of ATK to all enemies and stuns them for 0.5 seconds. Within the next 10 seconds, reduces their Physical DEF by 5% of Cetess' Physical DEF each time they take damage, up to 100%.
Increases damage dealt by 5% for every 10% Health lost.
Increases damage dealt by 10% for every 10% max Health lost.
